column4: I have Intel HD integrated audio (snd-hda-intel) but I also have a SoundBlaster Live! Value (snd-emu10k1). Which should I use?
I have Intel HD integrated audio (snd-hda-intel) but I also have a SoundBlaster Live! Value (snd-emu10k1). Which should I use? I can't hear any difference in sound quality.
OK. That's what I thought. Thanks!
